event.description: Felipe Lopez singles on a line drive to left fielder Juan Pierre.
Ryan Roberts singles on a ground ball to right fielder Andre Ethier. Felipe Lopez to 2nd.
Justin Upton walks. Felipe Lopez to 3rd. Ryan Roberts to 2nd.
Mark Reynolds grounds out, third baseman Casey Blake to first baseman James Loney. Felipe Lopez scores. Ryan Roberts to 3rd. Justin Upton to 2nd.
Eric Byrnes reaches on a fielder's choice out, pitcher Randy Wolf to third baseman Casey Blake. Ryan Roberts out at home.
Chris Young flies out to center fielder Matt Kemp.
Chris Snyder walks.
Augie Ojeda pops out to second baseman Orlando Hudson.
Dan Haren singles on a ground ball to right fielder Andre Ethier. Chris Snyder to 2nd.
Felipe Lopez singles on a ground ball to right fielder Andre Ethier. Chris Snyder to 3rd. Dan Haren to 2nd.
Ryan Roberts pops out to first baseman James Loney in foul territory.
Justin Upton hits a grand slam (10) to left field. Chris Snyder scores. Dan Haren scores. Felipe Lopez scores.
Mark Reynolds strikes out swinging.
Eric Byrnes pops out to first baseman James Loney in foul territory.
Chris Young grounds out, third baseman Casey Blake to first baseman James Loney.
Chris Snyder flies out to right fielder Andre Ethier.
Augie Ojeda flies out to right fielder Andre Ethier.

Felipe Lopez grounds into a double play, third baseman Casey Blake to second baseman Orlando Hudson to first baseman James Loney. Dan Haren out at 2nd.

Chris Young singles on a line drive to center fielder Matt Kemp. Eric Byrnes advances to 3rd, on a fielding error by center fielder Matt Kemp.
With Chris Snyder batting, Chris Young steals (5) 2nd base.
Chris Snyder grounds out, shortstop Rafael Furcal to first baseman James Loney.

Brad Ausmus grounds out, third baseman Ryan Roberts to first baseman Mark Reynolds.

Orlando Hudson pops out to third baseman Ryan Roberts in foul territory.

Matt Kemp flies out to center fielder Chris Young.

Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Jamie Hoffmann replaces Randy Wolf.
